How to Subscribe to Don't Be A Dick Monthly

29 Aug 2016

Reading time ~1 minute

If you are ever facing a decision where one of the options would be a dick move, donâ€™t do that.

The litmus test that I would use to determine if what you are about to do is a dick move, is to imagine yourself as the other person. Would you consider that action, if done to you, a dick move? If so, it is a dick move.
